snippet.title: One Btn Bosses - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
One Btn Bosses is a clever boss rush game for PC from developer Midnight Munchies that gives you exactly what the name promises: bosses that can be fought and defeated with just one button. But you're going to have to be smart about it.

#IGN
